summary: An overpowered spell that will strike at the very soul of your enemies.
descriptionHtml:
An overpowered spell that blasts the enemy with fire, ice, and shock damage.  In addition, it paralyzes the enemy and takes their soul if you have a soul gem available.  It is instant cast and no-cost.  

Great for those who have already completed the game, and are running through to explore every quest and corner of Skyrim.

Just do a console search: \'help \"spell of doom\" 0\' or find the tome in front of Ferengar Secretfire in Dragonsreach.
****************************************************** 
First mod...just messing around. Be gentle.

v1.2 - Added tome in game, and tweaked spell.
author: Milpagan82

files.name: Spell of DOOM
files.changelogHtml:
Added Spell Tome on Ferengar's Desk in Dragonsreach.
Tweaked some elements of the spell.
